description:
Arriving in Giorhaze, capital of the Underground World Giordal, Anos follows a 
wary Erdomaid to a church. There, they obtain a Pledge Jewel which summons 
dragons. Furthermore, Erdomaid sees Naya’s aptitude and makes a pack with 
her after learning her plan. Anos hears about Ahide’s actions from the bishop of 
the church and decides to catch him before he meets the pope.
Source: crunchyroll
